__e: - Hardly. - Last time I was there, there were five cars parked in the market place, and another three drove past while I was waiting.
Captain Berringer stood in the square and said if Long John Silver had a problem with this, he was welcome to show himself and voice it.
I found him at the market.
I saw you at the mall.
Listen, Charlie. When I go away, will you go back to that square in the middle of the town and take a good look at it?
It's the only way to get to the square on time.
